name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Rescue-Palooza!
description: Requires the tmnt-rescue-palooza-1.1.1.zip archive which can be found at https://www.merso-x.com/teenage-mutant-ninja-turtles-rescue

files.the_game: N/A:Select Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Rescue-Palooza! 1.1.1 zip archive to install

content:
files:
- the_game: N/A:Select Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Rescue-Palooza! 1.1.1 zip archive
    to install
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/TMNT Rescue-Palooza 1.1.1/TMNT Rescue-Palooza 1.1.1/TMNT_Rescue_Palooza.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/TMNT Rescue-Palooza 1.1.1/
    file: the_game
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
